properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 11:49AM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON EST TODAY
